Name: Aizkraukle
Description: Aizkraukle is known for its picturesque landscapes and historical sites. It s a regional hub for the surrounding rural areas.

Name: Jurmala
Description: Jurmala is famous for its sandy beaches, health resorts, and beautiful wooden architecture. Itâ€™s a popular tourist destination near Riga.

Name: Jelgava
Description: Jelgava is a city with a rich historical background, known for its 18th-century architecture and the famous Jelgava Palace.

Name: Liepaja
Description: Liepaja is a port city with a long history, famous for its beautiful beaches, music scene, and the unique Liepaja Sound of its historic organ.

Name: Ludza
Description: Ludza is known for its rich medieval history, particularly the Ludza Castle, and is one of the oldest towns in Latvia.

Name: Ventspils
Description: Ventspils is a bustling port city known for its modern infrastructure, shipping industry, and its beautiful beaches and parks.

Name: Riga
Description: Riga is the capital and largest city of Latvia, known for its historic Old Town, Art Nouveau architecture, and vibrant cultural scene.

Name: Kurzeme
Description: Kurzeme is a region in the western part of Latvia, known for its coastal landscapes, forests, and cultural heritage.

Name: Zemgale
Description: Zemgale is a central region in Latvia known for its agriculture, fertile lands, and many small towns with rich cultural histories.

Name: Vidzeme
Description: Vidzeme is a region in the north of Latvia, known for its forests, rivers, and medieval towns, including the historic city of Cesis.
